comment: Prof Cook is a very sweet professor. She always tries her best to help you out if you need it. She has weekly checkpoints and hw but they arent too hard Very leinant if you miss an assignment but tell her that you can't do it before hand she makes sure you can turn it in in another week. 3 essays first 2 have essay revision. Take her if u want an A

Very kind and makes lectures interesting. Answers my questions without making me feel dumb. Workload is light and honestly enjoyable. I'm trying to have her again as my professor for summer. Lots of opportunities to fix poor grades. Pretty voice to listen to as well. Very very nice and understanding and caring :))

She is the absolute best!!! I loved her class and her teaching style. She makes class very fun with interactive activities and classwork assignments. She is very understanding that things happen in life and gives you chances to earn some points back on late/missing assignments.

Absolute GEM!! I've never been a fan of english, but she walks you through every step. She would rather you ask her for assistance you need than enlisting in "other sources". Three essays total, one being somewhat hard-ish. Be sure to attend class for classwork material! Easy peasy course that you would actually enjoy!!!
I never really enjoyed English classes because their lectures were boring, but Prof. Cook's lectures correlate to the essays and are engaging. She is sweet and provides good feedback.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: I LOVED being in professor Cook class. She was very understanding, and she most definitely love what she does, and it shows how she gives her students the best feedback. I honestly wish I could take her for English 1102.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment:
One of the most amazing teachers I've ever had!
Her D2L was well-organized and all the assignment requirements were super clear. She gave personalized feedback for everything we submitted and her feedback was always super helpful. Along with being a great teacher, she genuinely cares about her students as people and wants to help them all succeed.

One of the best teachers/professors I've had. Literally the sweetest would take her for every class if I could. Offers extra credit, lets you revise, works with missed deadlines, gives detailed feedback, and actually engages with students.

A great option for ENGL1101&ENGL1102. She gives great feedback and will help you if you ask. There are three papers, reading journals, and quizzes. I would take this class again and again if I could. Take her!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor Cook is organized and understanding. She allows for an extension for a major grade and a revision for another major grade. Final project lets you be creative. You can make a video, podcast, instagram post, TikTok, storybook etc. Grades graciously and also provides feedback on assignments.

FANTASTIC PROFESSOR!! I took her class for both ENGL 1101/1102 and I encountered no problems during the semesters. There are 3 major assignments for 1102, and only one is an essay. Allows one extension which can be VERY helpful when life gets in the way too. She is also very caring and kind, which helps when you ask her for help. take her class!!

ENGL 2271
Ms. Cook is a great instructor who supports her students wihtin her class, it is obvious that she cares and want future teachers to understand what goes into being a teach. Def take her for ENGL 2271!! 
she does have group projects, but they are simple, and she helps so much when needed.

One of the only professors that understands life gets in the way sometimes. She offers an extension + revision (two separate graces each only one use) on the first two major assignments. Professor Cook gives us examples, is organized and friendly. I made a 92.5 and by far was one of the easiest classes I have taken at KSU. If you can take her do it

This has to be by far the easiest class I've ever taken. There are only 3 major grades, and you're able to revise all 3 papers if you didn't like your grade. She was very organized and had lots of resources if you were ever stuck on a writing assignment. Overall the way this course was set up made it feel like you were barely writing which was nice
basically a highschool teacher that does entirely too much

Sarah Cook, is a very caring professor who will help you every step of the way. She will look at your papers before you submit them for advice. There are three papers and no tests. If you get below a 90 you can resubmit your paper to aim for a higher score. You get one chance to turn in a paper after its late so save it. Overall very helpful.
she's such a caring teacher! I like how she gives the class individual and plenty feedback on your essays- that you'd have to TRY to get a bad grade on one of her essays. Take her if you can!!
Its easy
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Mrs. Cook is very caring and gives excellent feedback. She is willing to help and is very down to earth in her personality. I would take her a million times over if possible.

Professor Cook is really caring and sweet! Her class had a high school feel regarding her teaching methods. She engages well with her students. She allows her students to revise the first two essays to improve their grades. There are weekly discussions and about 3 reading-based quizzes, but they're not hard.
three big assignments and everything else is participation. she offers corrections on all big assignments and is very thorough with what the excepts. would take again for sure
Great professor. Super easy grader and fun classroom environment! Loves her students and truly wants to see them succeed. Would absolutely take her again.

Professor Cook was a great professor. The class was a little hard due to it being a research class, but she is always willing to help you and make sure you understand how to do the work. Lotsof little group assignments, that are helpful to your writing. You can revise the first two writing assignments to bring your grade up. I would take her again!
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback
